title: Android 10 nightmares
content:
My Google Pixel 2 XL has major issues since updating a few hours ago.  I've had this phone a year and a half now and have been absolutely impressed by it's speed, battery, quality, camera, etc.  It truly is an iPhone equalizer, if not better.  Each time I use the phone, I discover a new problem.  Here's a list of discovered problems that I have had in the first three hours of Android 10:

1) phone lags and is sluggish
2) gets hot during normal usage
3) battery drains twice as fast now
4) battery won't fast charge
5) Gmail crashes
6) no SIM card recognized
7) couldn't make a phone call unless I used Wi-Fi calling
8) couldn't receive calls
9) can't check voicemail 
(I know 7, 8, and 9 are all due to 6)
